infn.bed.event

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • infn.bed.event.EventManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.jlab.coda.jevio.IEvioListener

    public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jlab.coda.jevio.IEvioListener
    This is the manager for BDX specific events. This is where we load in the data and store them in the data classes. This class handles passing the waveshape data to the charge-time class and the waveshape data set to the plots in Bed.java.
    Author:
    heddle, Andy Beiter
